dict.acceptation: 方式；样式；时髦；仪表，品位；
使符合流行式样；用刻刀作装饰画；

sent.orig: The word style was used in our definition of fashion.
sent.trans: 款式(style)这个词曾用来给时装下定义。

sent.orig: The word style has yet another meaning within the fashion industry.
sent.trans: 在时装工业中，style还有另外一个意思。

sent.orig: Type: style, style, fashion style, style.
sent.trans: 种类：中式，欧式，时尚型，休闲型。

sent.orig: Jig variety of types, there is a fixed type, sub-degree-style, flat-style, flip-style, mobile column and zoning.
sent.trans: 钻模的类型繁多，有固定式，分度式，盖板式，翻转式，移动式和划柱式。

sent.orig: Style of writing and reflect a style of impure thought, work style of work.
sent.trans: 文风不实，反映出思想作风不纯、工作作风不实。
